import React from 'react' import { Card, Container, Row, Col, Form, Button, ToggleButtonGroup, Input } from 'react-bootstrap' import { FontAwesomeIcon } from '@fortawesome/react-fontawesome'; import { faUser, faComment } from '@fortawesome/free-solid-svg-icons'; const BlogScreen = () => { return (
{/* Antoine Hi! My name is Antoine and I'm French. People say that I'm kind and outgoing person! Last summer I was in Barcelona with my parents and I fell in love with Spanish language. So I'm really looking forward to all the people speaking Spanish. As a native French speaker I can help you with my language, and you are going to help me in my language learning path. Please text me if you are interested!!!! */} @example.com Antoine Hi! My name is Antoine and I'm French. People say that I'm kind and outgoing person! Learning: Spanish Peter I like Brezels and I want to try real German Brezels.... Please help me!! Learning: German Li Hua I wanna be your Chinese teacher even though I'm not that good in English! Try me ;) Learning: English Jessica Hey! It's Jessica! Let's just talk and be friends I'm sooooo bored rn!! I love music and art btw Learning: Korean Pedro I love pineapple on pizza so here I am - learning Hawaiian! ALOHA y'all and Happy PolyLearning!! Learning: Hawaiian Alisa Hello guys! My name's Alisa and I want to go to Poland this summer to visit my friends.. Learning: Polish
) } export default BlogScreen
